scripts.test-gorest: npm run del-feature && node helpers/get_cases.js 4 && npx cucumber-js gorest/features --tags 'not @skip' -f 'html:report/gorest.html' -f 'progress:report/gorest.txt'
scripts.test-marketplace: node helpers/get_cases.js marketplace_aggregator 29 && npx cucumber-js marketplace_aggregator/features --tags 'not @skip' -f 'html:report/cucumber-marketplace-aggregator.html' -f 'progress:report/cucumber-marketplace-aggregator.txt'
